timeline.bodyText: This test failed with the detection. Here it is missing the CANCEL command for the timer. But adding the command would lead to a different rejecting reason of the TRIGGER command (NOT_FOUND instead of INVALID_STATE). So, I removed the follow-up event ELEMENT_TERMINATED.

timeline.bodyText: I added the test case for the next release. I was also useful to verify that the issue is detected :)

timeline.bodyText: What if there is no such record?
timeline.author: deepthidevaki

replies.bodyText:
If there was no such record written on reprocessing then we can't apply any check 😅
Because of #5420, we can not fail and assume that something went wrong.
replies.author: saig0
